page.title: 05A WALK THROUGH HOLTON.
page.content: Holton is a peaceful village.It has recently had several new buildings built though there are still some lovely old houses.One of these is the old school house which we visited. In the old school house there lives an artist,his wife and his children.His wife told us that there used to be just two rooms.One for the older children and one for the younger.The older childrens room had a huge fire place with bars in front of it and the children used to put their bottles of milk between the bars to warm. It is now a house and it has had stairs built to create an upstairs studio.It still looks old outside and they have tried to preserve as much of the original interior as possible. There are lots of paintings on the walls.
